direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return boolean flags that indicate whether the server should change the IP or port in the Binding Response.
Both methods handle the changePortFlag, one for getting and one for setting its value.
Both methods handle the changeIpFlag, one for getting and one for setting its value.
Both methods interact with the changePortFlag and changeIpFlag, albeit in different contexts (one for decoding and one for getting).

enhanced_by.reason: Setting the changePortFlag is necessary to prepare the object state for testing getChangePortFlag.
Setting the changeIpFlag can be used to ensure a consistent state before testing getChangePortFlag.
Decoding the attribute body can set the changePortFlag, which is necessary to test getChangePortFlag.
Both methods return boolean flags that can be used to verify the state of the object after setting the changePortFlag.
